SEARCH
Module com.example.form
Package org.uwo.cs2212

Class ConfigUtil

java.lang.Object
org.uwo.cs2212.ConfigUtil
public class ConfigUtil extends Object
The ConfigUtil class provides utility methods for loading and saving configuration objects such as MapConfig, FloorMap, and UserList to and from JSON files. It makes use of the Jackson library for JSON deserialization and serialization.

  • Constructor Details

    • ConfigUtil

      public ConfigUtil()

  • Method Details

    • loadMapConfig

      public static MapConfig loadMapConfig(URL url)
      Loads a MapConfig object from the specified JSON file. This method reads the JSON file from the given URL, parses it, and maps the JSON data to a MapConfig object. It also loads the FloorMap objects for each BaseMap object present in the MapConfig object by iterating through the BaseMap and FloorMap configurations.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the JSON file containing the map configuration data to be loaded.
      Returns:
      The MapConfig object containing the map configuration data from the JSON file, including the associated FloorMap objects.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an IOException or URISyntaxException while reading the JSON file, mapping the JSON data to the MapConfig object, or loading the FloorMap objects.

    • loadFloorMap

      public static FloorMap loadFloorMap(URL url)
      Loads a FloorMap object from the specified JSON file. This method reads the JSON file from the given URL, parses it, and maps the JSON data to a FloorMap object.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the JSON file containing the floor map configuration data to be loaded.
      Returns:
      The FloorMap object containing the floor map configuration data from the JSON file.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an IOException or URISyntaxException while reading the JSON file or mapping the JSON data to the FloorMap object.

    • loadUserList

      public static UserList loadUserList(URL url)
      Loads a UserList object from the specified JSON file. This method reads the JSON file from the given URL, parses it,and maps the JSON data to a UserList object.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the JSON file containing the user data to be loaded.
      Returns:
      The UserList object containing the user data from the JSON file.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an IOException or URISyntaxException while reading the JSON file or mapping the JSON data to the UserList object.

    • loadUserLayers

      public static UserData loadUserLayers(URL url)
      Loads the user layers from a JSON file at the specified URL and returns a UserData object containing the user layers.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL of the JSON file containing the user layers data
      Returns:
      UserData object containing the user layers
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException or URISyntaxException occurs during the load operation

    • saveUserData

      public static void saveUserData(UserData userData, URL url)
      Saves the given UserData object to the specified file URL as a JSON string.
      Parameters:
      userData - the UserData object to be saved
      url - the URL of the file where the UserData object will be saved
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException or URISyntaxException occurs during the save operation

    • saveUserList

      public static void saveUserList(UserList userList, URL url)
      Saves the provided UserList object to the specified JSON file. This method serializes the UserList object into a JSON string and writes it to the file at the given URL.
      Parameters:
      userList - The UserList object containing the user data to be saved.
      url - The URL of the JSON file where the user data should be saved.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an IOException or URISyntaxException while writing the JSON data to the file.

    • updateFavorite

      private static void updateFavorite(BaseMap baseMap, FloorMap floorMap)
      Updates the favorite status of Points of Interest (POIs) in the given BaseMap and FloorMap based on the current user's list of favorite POIs.
      Parameters:
      baseMap - the BaseMap containing the FloorMap
      floorMap - the FloorMap containing the layers with POIs to update
